description.@en: Sometimes my back gives way to what I like to call ‘the molasses.’ I have a hard time getting started, and the pain is so incredible, I have to take a moment to get up and goin’.

data.notes: Grievous Injuries must undergo a successful Perform Surgery within twenty-four hours of suffering it, or else a character gains its related Permanent Injury.

effect.@en: Whenever your Turn starts in combat, make a Resolve Test. If failed, you refresh 1 fewer AP.
